resources.string: Destacar quadretz d\'o escaquero (zaguer movimiento y escaque)
Destín d\'as piezas (movimientos validos y anticipaus)
Lista de movimientos entre la partida
Inicial (en anglés) d\'a pieza (K, Q, R, B, N)

string.name: zenMode
string.comment:
zenMode
This is not the religious meaning. Turning this option on takes away make elements of the user interface.
Can also translate as 'Focus mode' as one example.

resources.string: Amostrar lo control de grandaria d\'o escaquero

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
string.comment:
whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
The < symbol is not required (you can write it as a word), just do NOT use < in its place.
Technical information: < is a reserved character in HTML, which is why it cannot be used.

string.name: gameBehavior
string.comment:
gameBehavior
In the user settings page, "Game behavior" is the title of the tab for configuring how the player can interact with the game.

resources.string: Fendo clic en a pieza y dimpués en o quadro de destín
Arrocegando la pieza dica o quadro de destín
Anticipaus (chugando en o redolín de l\'oponent)
Quan lo tiempo restante sía de < 30 segundos
Correspondencia y sin limite de tiempo
Confirmar abandono y ofiertas de taulas
Movendo lo rei dica la torre
Dentrada de movimientos con o teclau

string.name: snapArrowsToValidMoves
string.comment:
snapArrowsToValidMoves
The 'arrows' are for quick annotations you can do on the board, by holding right mouse button. With this setting enabled, it means the arrows will align themselves to places were pieces can move.

string.name: sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
string.comment:
sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
When enabled, this setting will automatically send 'Good game, well played' to your opponent if you are lose or draw the game. It's meant as a courtesy message.
The message will be sent in ENGLISH.
It is up to you how to deal with this. For example, you may want to put '(message will be sent in English)' in your translated text as one example. Or you can leave the actual English text and put a brief translation in your own language.

resources.string: Decir \"Buena partida, bien chugada\" en caso de redota u empaz
